events.message: I have just filed a claim after my car was involved in a collision at an intersection. The accident caused significant damage to my vehicle's front end and I need assistance to begin the process.
Your claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to the collision and damage described in your initial report.
An agent has been assigned to your case to help guide you through the claim process and address any concerns you may have.
We have acknowledged receipt of your auto accident claim and have started reviewing the details to ensure prompt handling.
Please submit the police report, photographs of the damaged vehicle, and your driving license to proceed with the investigation of your claim.
All requested documents including police report and vehicle images have been submitted successfully for evaluation.
Our team has started the investigation into the auto accident, reviewing all submitted evidence and statements from involved parties.
The investigation regarding the vehicle collision has been completed with no discrepancies found in the reports provided.
We have proposed a settlement amount that covers the estimated repair costs for your car based on the damage assessment.
Thank you for your prompt response and positive feedback regarding the proposed settlement offer for your accident claim.
Your claim has been approved after reviewing all documentation and investigation results, confirming coverage for your vehicle repairs.
The payment for your approved claim has been issued and should arrive within 3-5 business days to your designated bank account.
Your auto accident claim has been officially closed. We appreciate your cooperation throughout this process and wish you safe travels.
